short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create and view links between web pages

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Linked Pages designed to help users manage and navigate between interrelated web pages. It provides a simple and intuitive interface for users to save links to pages that are related to the current page they are viewing.
